summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3328, for the improvement of the alleys in blocks 20, 21 and 22, Mt. Baker Park Addition, being the alleys between 33rd Avenue South and 34th Avenue South from McClellan Street to College Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41084 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
